Title: The Card of Health
Description: Max Health +X.

Title: The Card of Life
Description: Max Health +X.

Title: The Card of Drink
Description: Add an extra (1) potion to each floor.

Title: The Card of Growth
Description: All Standard Potions +X.

Title: The Card of Swords
Description: Double one random Basic Sword per floor.

Title: The Card of Daggers
Description: Double one random Dagger per floor.

Title: The Card of Thick Skin
Description: Take 8hp of damage for each marked pile when leaving, but you can leave.

Title: The Card of Steel
Description: Swords are all +X.

Title: The Card of Wealth
Description: All Chests are +X.

Title: The Card of Heroes
Description: Full heal if you clear the whole floor.

Title: The Card of Hard Heads
Description: Resist every other Stun.

Title: The Card of Cures
Description: X% chance to resist poison.

Title: The Card of Wood
Description: Take X Less damage from thorns.

Title: The Card of Eyes
Description: All stacks visible at the start of each level.

Title: The Card of Means
Description: All treasures are set to X, but picking up any treasure puts adjacent enemies to sleep.

Title: The Card of Wants
Description: Double a random Chest.

Title: The Card of Temperament
Description: X% chance for Daggers to not reduce on use.

Title: The Card of Dampness
Description: Banner Beasts only add +2.

Title: The Card of Confidence
Description: Max Health -3, all Potions +X.

Title: The Card of Stones
Description: Slingshots come with +X Ammo.

Title: The Card of Sickness
Description: X% chance for the Slingshot to poison.

Title: The Card of Haste
Description: All Potions of Patience start at X.

Title: The Card of Cold
Description: Burning Steel has a X% chance to not hurt you.

Title: The Card of Privilege
Description: Each floor starts with a treasure in the first row.

Title: The Card of Bones
Description: No Hoarders.

Title: The Card of Knowledge
Description: Start with one random Scroll.

Title: The Card of Iron
Description: Daggers are all +X.

Title: The Card of Blades
Description: Shivs are all +X.

Title: The Card of Luck
Description: X% chance that Potions will heal you double.

Title: The Card of Swiftness
Description: The first time I would take damage on a floor, take no damage.

Title: The Card of Fish
Description: Bladefish are all +X.

Title: The Card of Equals
Description: Basic Swords are all X.

Title: The Card of Death
Description: X% chance for adjacent cards to be poisoned when you pick up a monster and take no damage.

Title: The Card of Recovery
Description: The first Potion I pick up on a floor is +X.

Title: The Card of Mud
Description: When Goo splits, it poisons the card it covers up.

Title: The Card of Strength
Description: Potion of Strength increases my bare-handed attack by 2.

Title: The Card of Sharing
Description: Rusty Edge does X damage to all enemies on pickup.

Title: The Card of Return
Description: The first time you are killed in a dungeon, revive with X hp.

Title: The Card of Ease
Description: Reduce all enemies by X (to a minimum of 1 strength).

Title: The Card of Aggression
Description: The first weapon you pick up on each floor is doubled.

Title: The Card of Cruelty
Description: Picking up a Potion does X damage to adjacent cards.

Title: The Card of Fossils
Description: Blades of grass have a X% chance to be normal swords.

Title: The Card of Precision
Description: Confusion lasts for 1 less turn.

Title: The Card of Chaos
Description: Gain one HP each turn you're confused.

Title: The Card of Clarity
Description: X% chance a card will show through confusion.

Title: The Card of The Deep
Description: Your weapon goes up by X after each floor.

Title: The Card of Study
Description: 50% fewer scrolls, but 50% of the time when you cast a spell, the scroll is not used up.

Title: The Card of Truth
Description: Fart every time.

Title: The Card of Escalation
Description: Each face-up card goes up by X when the stairs are reached.

Title: The Card of Plagues
Description: All poison does 2 damage a turn.

Title: The Card of Stalwarts
Description: You cannot die from poison.

Title: The Card of Keeping
Description: Weapons do not replace your held weapon, instead they add 1 to your current weapon, regardless of weapon type.

Title: My Friend The Stairs
Description: This happy little fellow is my ticket out of here.

Title: Rockboy
Description: Just your everyday bad guy. Nothing special.

Title: Spinder
Description: On Pickup: Poisons me if it does any damage. (Poison: Take 1 damage each turn)

Title: Craven
Description: 75% chance to swap places with nearby face-up cards.

Title: Zom-me?
Description: This looks like me? Better kill it before it escapes.

Title: Fist of Grollunder
Description: Counts down by 1 each turn, on 0 Stuns me.

Title: Vegetable
Description: Each turn increases its value by 1. On Pickup: Heals me, turns into a monster, doubles its value.

Title: Chopped Vegetable
Description: It seems upset.

Title: Corrosion
Description: On Pickup: Reduces face-up weapons by 1.

Title: Plague
Description: Its value is temporarily reduced by 3 for each face-up potion.

Title: Gravelboy
Description: On Pickup: Increases face-up slingshots by 1.

Title: Eye of Magmeera
Description: Counts down by 1 each turn, on 0 Curses me.

Title: Limb of the deep
Description: On Reveal: Phase adjacent cards. (Phase: Discard this card at the end of the turn)

Title: Touch of The Beyond
Description: On Reveal: Confuses me for X turns.

Title: Litchen
Description: On Pickup: Turns adjacent cards to stone.

Title: Voidwolf
Description: On Reveal: Consumes adjacent enemies and gains their value.

Title: Pack of Wolves
Description: On Reveal: Set value to 3 x (number of face-up wolves on the board).

Title: Granny-Smith
Description: On Pickup: Doubles the value of my equipped weapon.

Title: Swarmer
Description: On Pickup: All swarmers move.

Title: Kindlebeast
Description: â€‹Starts dry. After one turn, lights on fire. While on fire, does 1 damage to itself and 1 to me each turn.

Title: TwinTwin
Description: If adjacent to another twin, the two combine.

Title: Volatite
Description: On Pickup: Reduce all adjacent cards by 1

Title: Fungi
Description: On Pickup: Poison adjacent cards (reduce their value by 1 each turn)

Title: Nettle
Description: Thorny. Reduces value by 1 each turn. Loses Thorny at value 1. (Thorny: Always does full damage when picked up, regardless of weapon value.)

Title: Treehive
Description: Each turn has a 10% chance to spawn one bee. On Pickup: Hive heals me by its value, and spawns bees on all adjacent face-up piles.

Title: Gymgi
Description: Increases its value by 1 each turn.

Title: Iceboy
Description: A slightly rarer and stronger bad guy. Nothing special.

Title: Fearfox
Description: Value reduces by 3 each time I pick up a monster.

Title: Banner Beast
Description: On Reveal: Adjacent cards get +3. On Pickup: Adjacent cards get -3.

Title: Ancient Spinder
Description: On Pickup: Poisons me. (Poison: Take 1 damage each turn)

Title: Bee
Description: Randomly swap places with nearby face-up cards.

Title: Snowl
Description: On Pickup: Stuns me if it does any damage. (Stun: Take 2 turns for every 1. If already stunned, take 3 damage)

Title: Horror
Description: Value is always set to leave me with 1 health.

Title: Polywog
Description: On Reveal: polymorphs all visible monsters.

Title: Drain
Description: On Reveal: Phase adjacent cards. (Phase: Discard this card at the end of the turn)

Title: Weapon's Soul
Description: On Pickup: Increases all face-up weapons by 1

Title: Fear
Description: On Reveal: Forces me to drop my weapon.

Title: Invasive
Description: On Reveal: Spawn Bramblers on all other nearby face-up piles. On Pickup: Discard all face-up nearby Bramblers.

Title: Brambler
Description: Thorny. (Thorny: Always does full damage when picked up, regardless of weapon value.)

Title: Looker
Description: Starts asleep. Sleeps every other turn. If a card is picked up from an adjacent pile, moves onto that pile. (Sleep: ignore card actions).

Title: Timesholt
Description: On Pickup: Resets its pile to starting state, discards itself.

Title: Corralite
Description: On Pickup: Spawn a Hurchin or Sea Flower to every face-up pile.

Title: Hurchin
Description: Thorny. (Thorny: Always does full damage when picked up, regardless of weapon value.)

Title: Sea Flower
Description: On Pickup: Discard all face-up Sea Flowers and Hurchins.

Title: Cone of Darkness
Description: Hides an adjacent card's number.

Title: Accountant
Description: On Pickup: Adjusts adjacent cards by up to +/- 2.

Title: Goo
Description: On Pickup: If I take damage and there are adjacent face-up piles, splits in half.

Title: Wisp
Description: On Reveal: Swaps places with a random face-up card.

Title: Shuffler
Description: On Pickup: All face-up cards are sent to the bottom of their piles.

Title: Muddler
Description: On Pickup: Confuses me for two turns. (Confuse: Hide card types).

Title: Harmguard
Description: 50% chance to move towards the exit each turn.

Title: Phoenix
Description: On Pickup: Respawns if on fire.

Title: Potion's Soul
Description: On Pickup: Increases all face-up potions by 2.

Title: Lullabird
Description: On Pickup: puts adjacent monsters to sleep.

Title: Channeler
Description: Value is the value of all face-up monsters that are not Channelers (Minimum: 1).

Title: Doom
Description: Reduces its value by 1 each turn. At 0, all face-up Dooms hurt me by their value and then are discarded. On Pickup: Increase all face-up Doom values by 1-3.

Title: Two-Face
Description: Reduces value by 3 if it matches my weapon parity (matches even/odd with my weapon).

Title: Nihilist
Description: Reveals immediately. Value goes down by 3 each time I clear a pile on screen.

Title: Fowlest Mouth
Description: On Pickup: Curses me. (Curse: On Pickup of any card: Take damage equal to its value if I am cursed for its value. Replace previous cursed value with new value.)

Title: Martyr
Description: Each turn does 1 damage to itself and 1 damage to a random monster (or another card if no face-up monsters are present).

Title: Entangler
Description: All entanglers take all damage dealt to entanglers.

Title: Shifter
Description: Takes the form and ability of a random face-up monster each turn and then does that monster's action

Title: Fowlmouth
Description: On Pickup: If it damages me, curses me. (Curse: On Pickup of any card: Take damage equal to its value if I am cursed for its value. Replace previous cursed value with new value.)

Title: Haemophile
Description: Value goes up by 1 each time I take damage.

Title: Hoarder
Description: On Pickup: makes me gilded. (Gilded: gain rewards equal to the value of every non-treasure card I pick up).

Title: Beating Heart
Description: Be still foul beast!

Title: Airbox
Description: On Break: Push adjacent top cards away.

Title: Scenic Route
Description: On Pickup: Move the exit.

Title: Punching Bag
Description: On Break: Increase my unequipped attack by 1.

Title: Duplicator
Description: On Break: Duplicate the top card of every pile.

Title: Typhoonbox
Description: On Break: Push adjacent piles away.

Title: Mimorust
Description: Copies the highest adjacent card value. If no adjacent cards, dies.

Title: Potion of Healing
Description: Just a standard potion. On Pickup: Heals me by its value.

Title: Potion of Patience
Description: Its value goes up by 1 each turn. On Pickup: Heals me.

Title: Potion of Glamour
Description: On Pickup: Heals me, doubles the value of adjacent cards.

Title: Potion of Confusion
Description: On Pickup: Heals me by its value. Confuses me for 3 turns. (Confuse: Hide card types).

Title: Potion of Strength
Description: On Pickup: Heals me by its value and increases my bare-handed attack by 1.

Title: Potion of Recklessness
Description: On Pickup: Heals me by its value and then poisons me. (Poison: Take 1 damage each turn)

Title: Potion of Fitness
Description: On Pickup: Heals me by its value. Increases my maximum health by 1.

Title: Potion of Shattering
Description: On Pickup: Heals me by its value and breaks my weapon.

Title: Bravery Potion
Description: Heals me by my attack value +1.

Title: Fireball!
Description: Reduce target card by 7.

Title: Teleport
Description: Send target card to a random face-up pile.

Title: Flee
Description: Unmark target pile.

Title: Discover
Description: Reveal all piles adjacent to target card.

Title: Trespass
Description: Reveal and mark all piles adjacent to target card.

Title: Reduce
Description: Reduce all nearby face-up cards by the value of target card.

Title: Fortify
Description: Doubles my current weapon value.

Title: Ambition
Description: Reveal and mark every pile.

Title: Polymorph
Description: Polymorph target card.

Title: Forge
Description: Turn target card into a sword.

Title: Shuffle
Description: Shuffle every pile.

Title: Requip
Description: Summon the last weapon I had back to my hand

Title: Petrify
Description: Turn target card to stone.

Title: Banish
Description: Send target card to the back of its stack.

Title: Shove
Description: Move target card onto nearby pile.

Title: Poison
Description: Poison target card (It loses 1 value per turn).

Title: Increment
Description: Increase target card by 1.

Title: Bolster
Description: Raise current weapon by 3.

Title: Seal
Description: Protect my current weapon against breaking.

Title: Vitality
Description: Double current health

Title: Hunger
Description: Turn every face-up card into a mimic.

Title: Transmogrify
Description: Target card becomes a copy of an adjacent face-up card every turn.

Title: Energize
Description: Target card moves once every turn.

Title: Entropy
Description: Reshuffle and deal the entire board.

Title: Lv. 1 Token of Muster Upgrade
Description: Improve summoned potions to value 3 or 4.

Title: Lv. 2 Token of Muster Upgrade
Description: Summoned potions will now be value 4 or 5.

Title: Lv. 3 Token of Muster Upgrade
Description: Summon potions of value 5 or 6.

Title: Lv. 4 Token of Muster Upgrade
Description: Summon potions of value 6 or 7.

Title: Lv. 1 Scroll Summons Upgrade
Description: Summon additional Scroll types.

Title: Lv. 2 Scroll Summons Upgrade
Description: Summon even more Scroll types.

Title: Lv. 3 Scroll Summons Upgrade
Description: Summon so many Scroll types.

Title: Lv. 4 Scroll Summons Upgrade
Description: Summon all of the greatest Scroll types.

Title: Lv. 1 Weapon Beckon Upgrade
Description: Summon weapons of value 3 or 4.

Title: Lv. 2 Weapon Beckon Upgrade
Description: Improve summoned weapons to value 4 or 5.

Title: Lv. 3 Weapon Beckon Upgrade
Description: Weapons summoned will be value 5 or 6.

Title: Lv. 4 Weapon Beckon Upgrade
Description: Summon weapons of value 6 or 7.

Title: Vision Frog
Description: For astral clarity and clairvoyant perception.

Title: Living Compass
Description: Go where the compass points you. Or don't.

Title: Duster of Goob
Description: The Duster of Goob goes where no mop ever could.

Title: Mysterious Mochi
Description: The Mysterious Mochi boasts flavors both unnatural and unnecessary.

Title: Sludge of Life
Description: This is a truly terrible item, but being imbued with the essence of life, can't be passed up.

Title: Token of Frumpet
Description: On Pickup: Summons a random monster to a face-up pile.

Title: Weapon Beckon
Description: Adds a random weapon to target face-up pile.

Title: Token of Muster
Description: Adds a random potion to target face-up pile.

Title: Scroll Summons
Description: Adds a random scroll to target face-up pile.

Title: Treasure!
Description: Just some basic treasure. On Pickup: rewards me by its value.

Title: Mimic
Description: On Pickup: rewards and hurts me.

Title: Trophy
Description: Worth as much as the strongest monster defeated this floor. On Pickup: rewards me by its value.

Title: Covetous Gem
Description: Worth as much as the most powerful adjacent card. On Pickup: rewards me by its value.

Title: Shy Chest
Description: Hides at the bottom of it's pile when discovered. On Pickup: rewards me by its value.

Title: Greed Chest
Description: Doubles its value for each treasure I pick up. Resets to 1 if I pick up any other kind of card.

Title: A Small Pile of Gold
Description: It's a disappointing pile of gold. I wonder why this is here? On Pickup: rewards me by its value.

Title: Basic Sword
Description: Reduces monster damage. Breaks on opposite parity (doesn't match even/odd with the card I'm using it on).

Title: Rock Slinger
Description: Does 1 damage to any card. Ranged. (Ranged: Card Value represents ammo. Does not mark piles. Does not trigger On Pickup events.)

Title: Simple Dagger
Description: Each use reduces its value by 1.

Title: Burning Steel
Description: Damages me by 1 point each turn while equipped.

Title: Bladefish
Description: On Pickup: Equips as a weapon.

Title: Shiv
Description: Does not mark piles.

Title: Rusty Edge
Description: Damages me by its value on Pickup. Does 1 damage to adjacent enemies on use.

Title: Blade of Grass
Description: Reduces monster damage. Breaks on use.

Title: Feed Spur
Description: Value increases after each use.

Title: Bone Knife
Description: Other weapons do not replace this weapon.

Title: Cursed Blade
Description: On Pickup: Increase all face-up card values by 1.
